headline: Ask HN: How can E2E services like 1Password and Bitwarden offer password resets?
description:
This is what I don't get: if there is a way for another user – a family member or a team administrator – to reset the password of your E2E account, doesn't it mean, that the employees of 1Password[1], Bitwarden[2], and Tresorit[3] could do the same?

Then what is the entire purpose of such services, if their providers still need to be blindly trusted?

This is probably a required feature by most enterprise customers.

Maybe that's the reason why B2C-focused Standard Notes doesn't provide any way to recover your account if the password is lost[4].

[1] https://support.1password.com/recovery/

[2] https://bitwarden.com/help/admin-reset/

[3] https://support.tresorit.com/hc/en-us/articles/216114497-I-forgot-my-password

[4] https://standardnotes.com/help/6/i-ve-forgotten-my-password-what-should-i-do
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 像1Password和Bitwarden这样的E2E服务如何提供密码重设？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 像1Password和Bitwarden這樣的E2E服務如何提供密碼重設？
description_zh-Hans:
这就是我不明白的地方：如果有办法让其他用户--家庭成员或团队管理员--重置你的E2E账户的密码，这不意味着1Password[1]、Bitwarden[2]和Tresorit[3]的员工也可以这样做吗？

那么这些服务的全部目的是什么，如果他们的供应商仍然需要盲目信任的话？

这可能是大多数企业客户需要的功能。

也许这就是为什么专注于B2C的标准笔记没有提供任何方式来恢复你的帐户，如果密码丢失[4]。

[1] https://support.1 password.com/recovery/

[2] https://bitwarden.com/help/admin-reset/

[3] https://support.tresorit.com/hc/en-us/articles/216114497-I-forgot-my-password

[4] https://standardnotes.com/help/6/i-ve-forgotten-my-password-what-should-i-do
description_zh-Hant:

那麼這些服務的全部目的是什麼，如果他們的供應商仍然需要盲目信任的話？

這可能是大多數企業客戶需要的功能。

也許這就是為什麼專注於B2C的標準筆記沒有提供任何方式來恢復你的帳戶，如果密碼丟失[4]。
